name: MostOrModeratelyEffectiveContraceptiveMethods
title: Most or Moderately Effective Contraceptive Methods
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family Planning - provision of most or moderately effective contraceptive methods),(Data Element Scope: Most effective (i.e., sterilization, contraceptive implants, intrauterine devices or systems) or moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, ring, or diaphragm) methods of contraception),(Inclusion Criteria: Most effective (i.e., sterilization, contraceptive implants, intrauterine devices or systems) or moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, ring, or diaphragm) methods of contraception),(Exclusion Criteria: Less effective methods of contraception (i.e., male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods, spermicide))
